data.comment: Middlesbrough kick-off to get the first-half underway.
Jakob Lungi Sorensen (Norwich) has received a yellow card from Tony Harrington.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second half is underway in Middlesbrough - Norwich with the kick-off.
The away team have replaced Jordan Hugill with Teemu Pukki. This is the first substitution made today by Daniel Farke.
In the minute 50, The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Middlesbrough.
Marcus Tavernier (Middlesbrough) had a chance from the penalty spot but missed!
Neil Warnock (Middlesbrough) is making a first substitution, with Hayden Coulson replacing Marvin Johnson.
In the minute 66, Sam Folarin is on a sub for Djed Spence for Middlesbrough.
An attacking Norwich player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Goal! Norwich take a 0-1 lead thanks to a Teemu Pukki spot-kick..
In the minute 73, The home team replace Chuba Akpom with Britt Assombalonga.
Daniel Farke is making the team's second substitution at Riverside with Kenny McLean replacing Emiliano Buendia.
Patrick Roberts is replacing Marcus Tavernier for Middlesbrough at Riverside.
Tony Harrington blows to end the match. The final score is 0-1.
The away team replace Jakob Lungi Sorensen with Mario Vrancic.
Norwich make their third substitution with Alexander Tettey replacing Przemyslaw Placheta.
Christoph Zimmermann is replacing Marco Stiepermann for the away team.
